name: Cupidon Heaven
description:
Use arrows keys to move. Use the mouse to rotate  the bow and shoot with left mouse button. Find  Aphrodite heart  hidden in  a block. A legend said that  aphrodite heart was hidden in  a secret place in heaven. Cupidon is decided to find it. the legend  says it  has the power to bring  love to everyone on earth...
